```{python}
 
def merge_sort (array):

    if len(array) == 1:
        return array

    elif len(array) > 1:
        midpoint = len(array) // 2
        s1 = merge_sort(array[:midpoint])
        print(s1)
        s2 = merge_sort(array[midpoint:])
        print(s2)
        while len(s2) > 0:
            i = s2.pop()
            index_j = 0
            for j in s1:
                index_j += 1
                if j > i:
                    s1.insert(index_j, s2)
                    break
            s1.append(i)

    return s1
```
